basics.name: Erin Patterson
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Biology with a minor in Computer Sciences in the Departments of Natural Sciences and Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2024.

work.company: University of Hawaii at Manoa College of Tropical Agriculture and Human Resources
work.summary: Undergraduate lab assistant to graduate students in the entomology lab working with machine learning and data science
highlights: Engaged in a conservation biology lab, utilizing computer science and machine learning to develop innovative machinery for conservation efforts. Assisted in the design, programming, and deployment of devices, integrating technology with ecological research to enhance data accuracy and environmental impact.
Assist in lab maintenance and fieldwork.

Expert in skincare-focused cosmetics, adept at educating customers on ingredient benefits and their interactions with the skin. Delivered personalized service, enhancing customer satisfaction and driving sales through informed consultations and up-to-date knowledge of industry trends.
Assist in lab maintenance and fieldwork.
